metadata.description: Curated collection of production-ready skills for Claude Code - auditing, validation, and conversation analysis

plugins.name: codebase-auditor
plugins.description: Comprehensive static analysis tool that audits codebases for quality, security, and technical debt based on 2024-25 SDLC best practices
plugins.author: Connor

plugins.name: bulletproof-react-auditor
plugins.description: React application auditor based on Bulletproof React architecture guide - evaluates React projects against production-ready standards
plugins.author: Connor

plugins.name: claude-md-auditor
plugins.description: Validates and audits CLAUDE.md configuration files for Claude Code - ensures compliance with schema standards and best practices for LLM configuration
plugins.author: Connor

plugins.name: cc-insights
plugins.description: RAG-powered conversation analysis and semantic search - automatically processes Claude Code conversation history and generates intelligent insight reports
plugins.author: Connor

plugins.name: playwright-e2e-automation
plugins.description: Automated Playwright e2e testing framework with LLM-powered visual debugging, screenshot analysis, regression testing, and framework version detection
plugins.author: Connor

plugins.name: skill-creator
plugins.description: Automated skill generation tool that creates production-ready Claude Code skills following Claudex marketplace standards with intelligent templates, pattern detection, and quality validation
plugins.author: Connor
